actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing the District of Columbia and the territories and possessions of the United States to have Representatives in the House of Representatives.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that any territory or area of the United States (including the District of Columbia) may elect Representatives to the House of Representatives.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States allowing the District of Columbia and the territories and possessions of the United States to have Representatives in the House of Representatives.
